snippet: In the past, Representative Jesse L. Jackson Jr.’s campaigns have often seemed more like a formality than a fight, but not this year.
abstract: Rep Jesse L Jackson Jr of Illinois is hard at work fending off a primary challenge from former Rep Debbie Halvorson, in what has become the first substantial threat to his candidacy in the nine terms he has served as a Congressman; Jackson has become accustomed to winning elections by a wide margin, but his reputation has been tarnished in recent years due to an ethics investigation and allegations of an extramarital affair.
lead_paragraph: In the past, Representative Jesse L. Jackson Jr.’s campaigns have often seemed more like a formality than a fight, but not this year.

headline.seo: Jesse Jackson Jr. Faces Tough Race in Chicago
headline.main: A Rare Tough Race for Jackson in Chicago
headline.print_headline: Tough Race A Rarity For Jackson In Chicago
